Options: Yes, I can report for this period
No, I need to report for a different period
questions.text: Are you able to report for the calendar year during this time?
What dates will you be reporting for?
What dates will you be reporting for?
During the period, what was the business' total turnover?
Of total turnover, what was your business's turnover arising from commission and fees during the reporting period?
Of [total turnover], what was your business's turnover from sales on own account?
Does your business produce goods or services that protect the environment?
Of total turnover, approximately what percentage related to the production of environmental goods or services?
For the period, what was the business' expenditure on employment costs?
For the reporting period, what was your business's expenditure for all other energy, materials, goods and services?
During the reporting period, what was your business's expenditure on rates, duties, levies and taxes paid to the government?
During the period, what was the business' total value of capital assets acquired and disposed of?
During the period, what was the business' total value of capital assets acquired and disposed of?
During the period, what was the business' income from services provided to individuals, enterprises or other organisations based outside the UK?
During the reporting period, what was your business's expenditure on services provided by individuals, enterprises or other organisations based outside the UK?
During the period, did the business' export goods to individuals, enterprises or other organisations based outside the UK?
During the reporting period, did your business import goods from individuals, enterprises or other organisations based outside the UK?
Did the business' carry out any in-house Research and Development for the period, or intend to do so in the next reporting period?
Please provide any further details that will help us understand your figures and tell an industry story
